                                      "description": "Whether participants are placed in the [**Waiting Room**](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115000332726-Waiting-Room) when they join a meeting. \n\n If the **Waiting Room** feature is enabled, the [**Allow participants to join before host**](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/202828525-Allow-participants-to-join-before-host) setting is automatically disabled.",
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "example": true
                                    },
                                    "webinar_password": {
                                      "description": "Whether to generate a password when scheduling webinars. Participants must use the generated password to join the scheduled webinar.",
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "example": true
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "type": "object"
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "time_stamp": {
                          "type": "integer",
                          "description": "A timestamp that indicates when the lock setting was updated."
                        },
                        "old_object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the account's previous lock settings.",
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The updated account's ID."
                            },
                            "settings": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Information about the updated account or sub account settings. This only returns modified settings.",
                              "properties": {
                                "schedule_meeting": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/schedule_meeting"
                                },
                                "in_meeting": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/in_meeting"
                                },
                                "email_notification": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/email_notification"
                                },
                                "recording": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/recording"
                                },
                                "telephony": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/telephony"
                                },
                                "other_options": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/other_options"
                                },
                                "audio_conferencing": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/audio_conferencing"
                                },
                                "chat": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/chat"
                                },
                                "meeting_security": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/meeting_security"
                                },
                                "tsp": {
                                  "$ref": "#/paths/account.lock_settings_updated/post/requestBody/content/application~1json/schema/properties/payload/properties/object/properties/settings/properties/tsp"
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"account.lock_settings_updated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"g4ebA91YR7GPQw6QKvxwVw\",\n    \"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"settings\": {\n        \"recording\": {\n          \"auto_recording\": \"cloud\"\n        }\n      },\n      \"id\": \"eUblMKLnTMKX0pVvNAlA0Q\"\n    },\n    \"time_stamp\": 1626230691572,\n    \"old_object\": {\n      \"id\": \"zJ4Cu-awQEyypwYtM0HwrA\",\n      \"settings\": {\n        \"recording\": {\n          \"auto_recording\": \"cloud\"\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "account.disassociated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.disassociated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.disassociated\n\nThe **Sub Account has been disassociated** event is triggered every time a sub account is [disassociated](/api-reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/accountDisassociate) from a Master account.\n\nAn administrator or Zoom account owner can disassociate a sub account from their Master account. To do this in the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us), click the **Disassociate** button next to the sub account in the [**Account List**](https://zoomdev.us/account/sub/list) interface. To programmatically disassociate a sub account, use the [**Disassociate a sub account**](/api-reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/accountDisassociate) API.\n\nThe Master account owner must be you or a user of your [webhook-enabled](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/webhook-reference#enable-webhooks) app.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing) with the **Master account** option enabled.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Sub Account has been disassociated** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:sub_account:master`,`account:read:sub_account:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.disassociated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID under which the account was [disassociated](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Removing-a-user-from-your-account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d)."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who disassociated the account."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who disassociated the account."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the disassociated account.",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's ID."
                          },
                          "owner_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account owner's ID."
                          },
                          "owner_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The account owner's email address."
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.disassociated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_email\": \"jchill@example.com\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID under which the account was [disassociated](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Removing-a-user-from-your-account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d)."
                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "format": "email",
                          "description": "The email address of the user who disassociated the account."
                        },
                        "operator_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The user ID of the user who disassociated the account."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the disassociated account.",
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's ID."
                            },
                            "owner_id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account owner's ID."
                            },
                            "owner_email": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "email",
                              "description": "The account owner's email address."
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.disassociated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_email\": \"jchill@example.com\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "information_barriers.policy_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "information_barriers"
        ],
        "operationId": "information_barriers.policy_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# information_barriers.policy_updated\n\nThe **Information barriers policy has been updated** event is triggered when using an API or web page to update an [information barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers).\n\nAs an account owner or admin can update information barrier policies. Update an information barrier policy either by using the Update an information barriers policy API, or by logging into the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us) and navigating to the [**information barrier**](https://zoom.us/account/information_barriers) page.\n\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* To enable information barriers for yout account, [contact Zoom Support](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362003).\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barriers:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barrier:update:policy:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `information_barriers.policy_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who updated the policy."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "assigned_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assigner group's (Group 1) ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "policy_name": {
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "settings": {
                            "additionalProperties": false,
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's settings. \n* If the meeting setting is true, then a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups. \n* If the meeting setting is false but the screen_share, file_transfer, in_meeting_chat, im, and/or recording settings are true, then a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups.",
                            "properties": {
                              "complete_phone_calls": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** call each other.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "file_transfer": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** transfer files in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "im": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** IM chat. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "in_meeting_chat": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** use chat in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "meeting": {
                                "description": "If true, the users between groups **cannot** meet. This also creates a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "message_via_sms": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** user SMS.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "recording": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** record the meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false. \n\nThis feature is only available for Zoom Client v5.6.0 and higher.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "screen_share": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** share screens in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              }
                            },
                            "required": [
                              "meeting",
                              "screen_share",
                              "file_transfer",
                              "in_meeting_chat",
                              "complete_phone_calls",
                              "message_via_sms",
                              "im",
                              "recording"
                            ],
                            "type": "object"
                          },
                          "status": {
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's status: \n* 0 \u2014 Disabled. \n* 1 \u2014 Enabled.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          },
                          "to_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assignee group's (Group 2) ID.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "mjLMOSAERBaakF8kSDWB7g"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "default": 0,
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1,
                              2,
                              3
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          }
                        },
                        "description": "The diff of the [Information Barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policy and its information.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "assigned_group_id",
                          "to_group_id",
                          "policy_name",
                          "settings",
                          "type",
                          "status"
                        ],
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"information_barriers.policy_updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1660013569332,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"Mt6sv4u0TAyPkwgsL2lxiA\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n            \"id\": \"0r1HpfZYQB6gWNSdlGYS9A\",\n\t\t\t\"new_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t},\n            \"old_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": true,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "object"
                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the user who updated the policy."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "assigned_group_id": {
                              "description": "The assigner group's (Group 1) ID.",
                              "type": "string"
                            },
                            "policy_name": {
                              "description": "The Information Barriers policy's name.",
                              "type": "string"
                            },
                            "settings": {
                              "additionalProperties": false,
                              "description": "The Information Barriers policy's settings. \n* If the meeting setting is true, then a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups. \n* If the meeting setting is false but the screen_share, file_transfer, in_meeting_chat, im, and/or recording settings are true, then a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups.",
                              "properties": {
                                "complete_phone_calls": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** call each other.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "file_transfer": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** transfer files in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "im": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** IM chat. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "in_meeting_chat": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** use chat in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "meeting": {
                                  "description": "If true, the users between groups **cannot** meet. This also creates a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "message_via_sms": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** user SMS.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "recording": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** record the meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false. \n\nThis feature is only available for Zoom Client v5.6.0 and higher.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "screen_share": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** share screens in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                }
                              },
                              "required": [
                                "meeting",
                                "screen_share",
                                "file_transfer",
                                "in_meeting_chat",
                                "complete_phone_calls",
                                "message_via_sms",
                                "im",
                                "recording"
                              ],
                              "type": "object"
                            },
                            "status": {
                              "description": "The Information Barriers policy's status: \n* 0 \u2014 Disabled. \n* 1 \u2014 Enabled.",
                              "enum": [
                                0,
                                1
                              ],
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 1
                            },
                            "to_group_id": {
                              "description": "The assignee group's (Group 2) ID.",
                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "mjLMOSAERBaakF8kSDWB7g"
                            },
                            "type": {
                              "default": 0,
                              "description": "The Information Barriers policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                              "enum": [
                                0,
                                1,
                                2,
                                3
                              ],
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 1
                            }
                          },
                          "description": "The diff of the [Information Barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policy and its information.",
                          "required": [
                            "id",
                            "assigned_group_id",
                            "to_group_id",
                            "policy_name",
                            "settings",
                            "type",
                            "status"
                          ],
                          "additionalProperties": false
                        }
                      },
                      "additionalProperties": false
                    }
                  },
                  "additionalProperties": false
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"information_barriers.policy_updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1660013569332,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"Mt6sv4u0TAyPkwgsL2lxiA\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n            \"id\": \"0r1HpfZYQB6gWNSdlGYS9A\",\n\t\t\t\"new_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t},\n            \"old_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": true,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "account.vanity_url_approved": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.vanity_url_approved",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.vanity_url_approved\n\nThe **Account's vanity url approved** event is triggered each time an account or sub account's [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646) is approved.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing) with the **Master account** option enabled.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **Account's vanity url approved** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:vanity_url:master`,`account:read:vanity_url:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.vanity_url_approved`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who approved the account's vanity URL."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the account's approved vanity URL.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "vanity_url"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's ID."
                          },
                          "vanity_url": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The approved [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646-Guidelines-for-Vanity-URL-requests)."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.vanity_url_approved\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"vanity_url\": \"https://example.com\",\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "operator",
                        "object"
                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "format": "email",
                          "description": "The email address of the user who approved the account's vanity URL."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the account's approved vanity URL.",
                          "required": [
                            "id",
                            "vanity_url"
                          ],
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's ID."
                            },
                            "vanity_url": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The approved [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646-Guidelines-for-Vanity-URL-requests)."
                            }
                          },
                          "additionalProperties": false
                        }
                      },
                      "additionalProperties": false
                    }
                  },
                  "additionalProperties": false
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.vanity_url_approved\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"vanity_url\": \"https://example.com\",\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "account.settings_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.settings_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.settings_updated\n\nZoom triggers this event when an account or a sub account's [settings](https://zoom.us/account/setting) are updated.\nThe account must belong either to you or a user of your [webhook-enabled](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/webhook-reference#enable-webhooks) app.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The \"**Account/Sub Account's setting has been updated**\" subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:account_setting:master`,`account:read:account_setting:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.settings_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who updated the account's settings."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who updated the account's settings."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the updated fields.",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The updated account's ID."
                          },
                          "settings": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the account's updated settings.",
                            "properties": {
                              "schedule_meeting": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "Information about the schedule meeting settings.",
                                "properties": {
                                  "host_video": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to start meetings with the host video on."
                                  },
                                  "participant_video": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to start meetings with the participant video on."
                                  },
                                  "audio_type": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The type of audio used to join the meeting."
                                  },
                                  "join_before_host": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether participants can join the meeting before its host."
                                  },
                                  "enforce_login": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether only users who are signed in to Zoom can join meetings."
                                  },
                                  "enforce_login_with_domains": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether only users with a specific domain can join meetings."
                                  },
                                  "enforce_login_domains": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The specified domains for users to sign in to in order to join meetings."
                                  },
                                  "not_store_meeting_topic": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to display the \"Zoom Meeting\" message as the meeting's topic."
                                  },
                                  "force_pmi_jbh_password": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to require a password for personal meetings if attendees can join before host."
                                  },
                                  "use_pmi_for_scheduled_meetings": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Use a [PMI (Personal Meeting ID)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203276937-Using-Personal-Meeting-ID-PMI-) to schedule meeting."
                                  },
                                  "pstn_password_protected": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Require a password from participants before joining a meeting via [PSTN](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204517069-Getting-Started-with-Personal-Audio-Conference)."
                                  },
                                  "jbh_time": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      0,
                                      5,
                                      10,
                                      15
                                    ],
                                    "description": "If the value of the join_before_host field is true, this field indicates the time limits within which a participant can join a meeting before the meeting's host:\n\n* 0 \u2014 Allow the participant to join the meeting at anytime.\n* 5 \u2014 Allow the participant to join 5 minutes before the meeting's start time.\n* 10 \u2014 Allow the participant to join 10 minutes before the meeting's start time."
                                  },
                                  "personal_meeting": {
                                    "description": "The personal meeting settings:\n* true \u2014 Indicates that the **Enable Personal Meeting ID** setting is enabled. Users can use a personal meeting ID for their meetings.\n* false \u2014 Indicates that the **Enable Personal Meeting ID** setting is [disabled](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362843-Personal-meeting-ID-PMI-and-personal-link#h_aa0335c8-3b06-41bc-bc1f-a8b84ef17f2a). When this setting is **disabled**, meetings that were scheduled with a PMI will be invalid. You must manually update any scheduled meetings.\n\n**For Zoom Phone only:**\n\nIf a user has been assigned a desk phone, the desk phone's **Elevate to Zoom Meeting** setting will be disabled.",
                                    "type": "boolean"
                                  },
                                  "require_password_for_instant_meetings": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether a random password will be generated on the end of user who starts the instant meeting. Other meeting participants **must** enter the generated password to join the meeting.\n\nIf instant meetings use a PMI, this option is **disabled**."
                                  },
                                  "mute_upon_entry": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to automatically mute all participants when they join the meeting."
                                  },
                                  "require_password_for_pmi_meetings": {
                                    "description": "Require participants to enter password for PMI meetings:\n* jbh_only \u2014 Only when a participant joins before the host.\n* all \u2014 All participants must enter a password to join the meeting.\n* none \u2014 No password required.",
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "enum": [
                                      "jbh_only",
                                      "all",
                                      "none"
                                    ]
                                  },
                                  "use_pmi_for_instant_meetings": {
                                    "description": "Whether PMI is enabled for all instant meetings.",
                                    "type": "boolean"
                                  },
                                  "require_password_for_scheduling_new_meetings": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether a password is generated when a meeting host schedules a new meeting. Meeting participants will be required to enter the password before they can join the meeting.\n\nThis setting only applies to regular meetings that do **not** use a PMI."
                                  },
                                  "pmi_password": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The PMI's password."
                                  },
                                  "upcoming_meeting_reminder": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to receive a desktop notification for upcoming meetings."
                                  },
                                  "always_display_zoom_meeting_as_topic": {
                                    "description": "Information about the [**Always display \"Zoom Meeting\" as the meeting topic**](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363253-Changing-account-settings#h_01EG9BJ646V2WJK1S3H2MP6YV6) setting.",
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Always display \"Zoom Meeting\" as the meeting topic** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "display_topic_for_scheduled_meetings": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to display \"Zoom Meeting\" as the topic for already-scheduled meetings."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "hide_meeting_description": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the **Hide meeting description** feature.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Hide meeting description** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "hide_description_for_scheduled_meetings": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to hide the description for already-scheduled meetings."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "always_display_zoom_webinar_as_topic": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the [**Always show \"Zoom Webinar\" as the webinar topic**](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363253-Changing-account-settings#h_01EG9BJ646V2WJK1S3H2MP6YV6) setting.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Always show \"Zoom Webinar\" as the webinar topic** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "display_topic_for_scheduled_webinars": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to display \"Zoom Webinar\" as the topic for already-scheduled meetings."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "hide_webinar_description": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the **Hide webinar description** feature.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Hide webinar description** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "hide_description_for_scheduled_webinars": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to hide webinar description for the webinars which have already been scheduled."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "in_meeting": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "Information about the in meeting settings.",
                                "properties": {
                                  "e2e_encryption": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to require [AES encryption](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard) for meetings."
                                  },
                                  "chat": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether meeting participants can use [in-meeting chat](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203650445-In-Meeting-Chat)."
                                  },
                                  "allow_users_to_delete_messages_in_meeting_chat": {
                                    "description": "If the value of this field is set to true,  allow users to delete messages in the in-meeting chat.\n",
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "example": true
                                  },
                                  "allow_participants_chat_with": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      1,
                                      2,
                                      3,
                                      4
                                    ],
                                    "x-enum-descriptions": [
                                      "No one",
                                      "Host and co-hosts",
                                      "Everyone",
                                      "Everyone and anyone directly"
                                    ],
                                    "description": "Whether participants can chat with certain groups:\n* 1 \u2014 The participants cannot use chat.\n* 2 \u2014 Host and co-hosts only.\n * 3 \u2014 The participants can chat with other participants publicly.\n* 4 - The participants can chat with other participants publicly and privately.\n\n**Note:** This setting is only available with client versions 5.7.3 and above."
                                  },
                                  "allow_users_save_chats": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      1,
                                      2,
                                      3
                                    ],
                                    "x-enum-descriptions": [
                                      "Not allowed",
                                      "Host and co-hosts",
                                      "Everyone"
                                    ],
                                    "description": "Whether participants can save meeting chats:\n* 1 \u2014 Participants cannot save meeting chats.\n* 2 \u2014 Participants can only save host and co-host meeting chats.\n* 3 \u2014 Participants can save all meeting chats."
                                  },
                                  "private_chat": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether meeting participants can use private chat."
                                  },
                                  "auto_saving_chat": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to automatically save all in-meeting chats."
                                  },
                                  "file_transfer": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether file sharing via in-meeting chat is enabled."
                                  },
                                  "feedback": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether users can send feedback to Zoom at the end of the meeting."
                                  },
                                  "post_meeting_feedback": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to display a post-meeting feedback survey at the end of a meeting."
                                  },
                                  "co_host": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to allow the meeting host to add co-hosts."
                                  },
                                  "polling": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether polls are available in the meeting controls."
                                  },
                                  "meeting_polling": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the account's meeting polling settings.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the host can add polls before or during a meeting."
                                      },
                                      "advanced_polls": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the host can create advanced polls and quizzes. Advanced polls and quizzes include single choice, multiple choice, drop down, matching, short answer, long answer, rank order, and fill-in-the-blank questions. Hosts can also set the correct answers for quizzes they create."
                                      },
                                      "require_answers_to_be_anonymous": {
                                        "description": "Whether to require answers to be anonymous.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "allow_alternative_host_to_add_edit": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether alternative hosts can add or edit polls and quizzes."
                                      },
                                      "manage_saved_polls_and_quizzes": {
                                        "description": "Whether to allow users to manage saved polls and quizzes from Meetings",
                                        "type": "boolean"
                                      },
                                      "allow_host_to_upload_image": {
                                        "description": "Whether to allow host to upload an image for each question.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "attendee_on_hold": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether hosts can temporarily place an attendee on hold."
                                  },
                                  "show_meeting_control_toolbar": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to always display the meeting control bar."
                                  },
                                  "allow_show_zoom_windows": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to display the Zoom desktop application when sharing access."
                                  },
                                  "annotation": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether participants can use annotation tools to add information to shared screens."
                                  },

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.vanity_url_rejected\n\nThe **Account vanity url rejected** event is triggered each time an account or subaccount's [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646) is rejected.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing) with the **Master account** option enabled.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **Account's vanity url rejected** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:vanity_url:master`,`account:read:vanity_url:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.vanity_url_rejected`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",

    "account.created": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.created",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.created\n\nThe **Sub Account has been created** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users creates a sub account.\n\nA Master account administrator or an account owner can create sub accounts under the Master account. A sub account can be created either by using the [**Create a Sub Account**](/api-reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/accountCreate) API or by logging into the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us) and navigating to the [**Add Sub Account**](https://zoom.us/account/sub/add) page.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing) with the **Master account** option enabled.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Sub Account has been created** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:sub_account:master`,`account:read:sub_account:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.created`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who created the account."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who created the account."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the created account.",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's ID."
                          },
                          "owner_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account owner's ID."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The account email address."
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.created\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\t\"email\": \"jchill@example.com\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },

            "content": {

                        },

                  "json-example": {

                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.created\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\t\"email\": \"jchill@example.com\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
