    "information_barriers.policy_deleted": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "information_barriers"
        ],
        "operationId": "information_barriers.policy_deleted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# information_barriers.policy_deleted\n\nThe **Information barriers policy has been deleted** event is triggered when using an API or web page to delete an [information barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers).\n\nAn account owner or admin can create information barrier policies. Delete an information barrier policy either by using the Remove an information barrier policy API, or by logging into the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us) and navigating to the [**Information barrier**](https://zoom.us/account/information_barriers) page.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* To enable information barriers for your account, [contact Zoom Support](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362003).\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barriers:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barrier:delete:policy:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `information_barriers.policy_deleted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp when the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who deleted the policy."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "An [information barrier's](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policies and its information.",
                        "properties": {
                          "assigned_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assigner group's (Group 1) ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "policy_name": {
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "settings": {
                            "additionalProperties": false,
                            "description": "The information barriers policy's settings. \n* If the meeting setting is true, then a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups. \n* If the meeting setting is false but the screen_share, file_transfer, in_meeting_chat, im, and/or recording settings are true, then a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups.",
                            "properties": {
                              "complete_phone_calls": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** call each other.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "file_transfer": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** transfer files in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "im": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** IM chat. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "in_meeting_chat": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** use chat in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "meeting": {
                                "description": "If true, the users between groups **cannot** meet. This also creates a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "message_via_sms": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** user SMS.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "recording": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** record the meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false. \n\nThis feature is only available for Zoom Client v5.6.0 and higher.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "screen_share": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** share screens in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              }
                            },
                            "required": [
                              "meeting",
                              "screen_share",
                              "file_transfer",
                              "in_meeting_chat",
                              "complete_phone_calls",
                              "message_via_sms",
                              "im",
                              "recording"
                            ],
                            "type": "object"
                          },
                          "status": {
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's status: \n* 0 \u2014 Disabled. \n* 1 \u2014 Enabled.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          },
                          "to_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assignee group's (Group 2) ID.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "mjLMOSAERBaakF8kSDWB7g"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "default": 0,
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1,
                              2,
                              3
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          }
                        },
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "assigned_group_id",
                          "to_group_id",
                          "policy_name",
                          "settings",
                          "type",
                          "status"
                        ],
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"information_barriers.policy_deleted\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1660013569332,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"Mt6sv4u0TAyPkwgsL2lxiA\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"0r1HpfZYQB6gWNSdlGYS9A\",\n\t\t\t\"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t\"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t\"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t\"settings\": {\n\t\t\t\t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"file_transfer\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t},\n\t\t\t\"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t\"status\": 1\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },

                      "description": "A timestamp when the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [

                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {

                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "An [information barrier's](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policies and its information.",
                          "properties": {

                              "properties": {
                                "complete_phone_calls": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** call each other.",
                                  "type": "boolean"
                                },
                                "file_transfer": {
                                  "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** transfer files in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                  "type": "boolean"

                                "im": {

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

                              "description": "The information barrier's policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                              "enum": [

                                3
                              ],
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 1
                            }
                          },
                          "required": [

    "account.updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.updated\n\nThe **Account/Sub Account's profile has been updated** event is triggered every time the [profile](https://zoom.us/account) of an account or a sub account is updated.\n\nAn account owner or a user with administrator privileges can update a Zoom account's profile. The account profile can be updated by logging into the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us/) and editing fields in the [**Account Profile**](https://zoom.us/account) interface.\n\nThe account must belong to you or a user of your [webhook-enabled](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/webhook-reference#enable-webhooks) app.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Account/Sub Account's profile has been updated** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:sub_account:master`,`account:read:sub_account:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who updated the account."
                      },
                      "operation": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "This field only returns for the following operations: \n* apply_vanity_url \n* managed_domains_added \n* managed_domains_deleted \n* managed_domains_verifying",
                        "enum": [
                          "apply_vanity_url",
                          "managed_domains_added",
                          "managed_domains_deleted",
                          "managed_domains_verifying"
                        ]
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the updated account.",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's ID."
                          },
                          "account_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's updated name."
                          },
                          "account_alias": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's updated alias."
                          },
                          "account_support_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's updated name for account support."
                          },
                          "account_support_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The account's updated email address for account support."
                          },
                          "managed_domains": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The account's updated managed domains.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "string"
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "old_object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the account's previous profile settings.",
                        "properties": {
                          "$changed_field_name": {
                            "description": "The updated field name and its previous value.",
                            "type": "string"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"account_name\": \"Jill Chill\",\n\t\t\t\"account_alias\": \"JChill\"\n\t\t},\n\t\t\"old_object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"account_name\": \"Jill Chill\",\n\t\t\t\"account_alias\": \"Jill_Chill\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {

                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "format": "email",
                          "description": "The email address of the user who updated the account."
                        },
                        "operation": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "This field only returns for the following operations: \n* apply_vanity_url \n* managed_domains_added \n* managed_domains_deleted \n* managed_domains_verifying",
                          "enum": [
                            "apply_vanity_url",
                            "managed_domains_added",
                            "managed_domains_deleted",
                            "managed_domains_verifying"
                          ]
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the updated account.",
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's ID."
                            },
                            "account_name": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's updated name."
                            },
                            "account_alias": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's updated alias."
                            },
                            "account_support_name": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's updated name for account support."
                            },
                            "account_support_email": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "email",
                              "description": "The account's updated email address for account support."
                            },
                            "managed_domains": {
                              "type": "array",
                              "description": "The account's updated managed domains.",
                              "items": {
                                "type": "string"
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "old_object": {

                          "description": "Information about the account's previous profile settings.",

                              "type": "string"
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"account_name\": \"Jill Chill\",\n\t\t\t\"account_alias\": \"JChill\"\n\t\t},\n\t\t\"old_object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"account_name\": \"Jill Chill\",\n\t\t\t\"account_alias\": \"Jill_Chill\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }

    "information_barriers.policy_created": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "information_barriers"
        ],
        "operationId": "information_barriers.policy_created",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# information_barriers.policy_created\n\nThe **Information barriers policy has been created** event is triggered when using an API or web page to add an [information barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers).\n\nAn account owner or admin can create information barrier policies. Create an information barrier policy either by using the Create an information barrier policy API, or by logging into the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us) and navigating to the [**Information barrier**](https://zoom.us/account/information_barriers) page.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n*  To enable information barriers for your account, [contact Zoom Support](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362003).\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barriers:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barrier:write:policy:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `information_barriers.policy_created`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp when the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who created the policy."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "An [information barrier's](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policies and its information.",
                        "properties": {
                          "assigned_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assigner group's (Group 1) ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "policy_name": {
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "settings": {
                            "additionalProperties": false,
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's settings. \n* If the meeting setting is true, then a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups. \n* If the meeting setting is false but the screen_share, file_transfer, in_meeting_chat, im, and/or recording settings are true, then a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups.",
                            "properties": {
                              "complete_phone_calls": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** call each other.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "file_transfer": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** transfer files in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "im": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** IM chat. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "in_meeting_chat": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** use chat in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "meeting": {
                                "description": "If true, the users between groups **cannot** meet. This also creates a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "message_via_sms": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** user SMS.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "recording": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** record the meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false. \n\nThis feature is only available for Zoom Client v5.6.0 and higher.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "screen_share": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** share screens in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              }
                            },
                            "required": [
                              "meeting",
                              "screen_share",
                              "file_transfer",
                              "in_meeting_chat",
                              "complete_phone_calls",
                              "message_via_sms",
                              "im",
                              "recording"
                            ],
                            "type": "object"
                          },
                          "status": {
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's status: \n* 0 \u2014 Disabled. \n* 1 \u2014 Enabled.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          },
                          "to_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assignee group's (Group 2) ID.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "mjLMOSAERBaakF8kSDWB7g"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "default": 0,
                            "description": "The information barrier's policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1,
                              2,
                              3
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          }
                        },
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "assigned_group_id",
                          "to_group_id",
                          "policy_name",
                          "settings",
                          "type",
                          "status"
                        ],
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"information_barriers.policy_created\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1660013569332,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"Mt6sv4u0TAyPkwgsL2lxiA\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"0r1HpfZYQB6gWNSdlGYS9A\",\n\t\t\t\"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t\"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t\"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t\"settings\": {\n\t\t\t\t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"file_transfer\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t\t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t},\n\t\t\t\"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t\"status\": 1\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {

                              "properties": {

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

    "account.lock_settings_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.lock_settings_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.lock_settings_updated\n\nZoom triggers the **Account settings lock status updated** event when an account or a sub account enables or disables a lock for a [setting](https://zoom.us/account/setting).\n\nThe account must belong to either you or a user of your [webhook-enabled](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/webhook-reference#enable-webhooks) app.\n\nAccount owners or users with admin privileges can [manually update](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363253-Account-Settings#h_419c57b8-0d83-4ff3-8910-3e5dfb7be3a0) account lock settings from the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us/), or by using  the [Update Settings](/api-reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/updateAccountLockSettings) API.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\nTo receive notifications for this event, you must meet the following prerequisites.\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n  * The \"**Account settings lock status updated**\" subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:lock_settings:master`,`account:read:lock_settings:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.lock_settings_updated`\n",

                                },

    "account.disassociated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.disassociated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.disassociated\n\nThe **Sub Account has been disassociated** event is triggered every time a sub account is [disassociated](/api-reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/accountDisassociate) from a Master account.\n\nAn administrator or Zoom account owner can disassociate a sub account from their Master account. To do this in the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us), click the **Disassociate** button next to the sub account in the [**Account List**](https://zoomdev.us/account/sub/list) interface. To programmatically disassociate a sub account, use the [**Disassociate a sub account**](/api-reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/accountDisassociate) API.\n\nThe Master account owner must be you or a user of your [webhook-enabled](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/webhook-reference#enable-webhooks) app.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing) with the **Master account** option enabled.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Sub Account has been disassociated** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:sub_account:master`,`account:read:sub_account:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.disassociated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID under which the account was [disassociated](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Removing-a-user-from-your-account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d)."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who disassociated the account."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who disassociated the account."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the disassociated account.",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's ID."
                          },
                          "owner_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account owner's ID."
                          },
                          "owner_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The account owner's email address."
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.disassociated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_email\": \"jchill@example.com\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID under which the account was [disassociated](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Removing-a-user-from-your-account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d)."
                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "format": "email",
                          "description": "The email address of the user who disassociated the account."
                        },
                        "operator_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The user ID of the user who disassociated the account."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the disassociated account.",
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's ID."
                            },
                            "owner_id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account owner's ID."
                            },
                            "owner_email": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "email",
                              "description": "The account owner's email address."
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.disassociated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\t\"owner_email\": \"jchill@example.com\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "information_barriers.policy_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "information_barriers"
        ],
        "operationId": "information_barriers.policy_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# information_barriers.policy_updated\n\nThe **Information barriers policy has been updated** event is triggered when using an API or web page to update an [information barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers).\n\nAs an account owner or admin can update information barrier policies. Update an information barrier policy either by using the Update an information barriers policy API, or by logging into the [Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us) and navigating to the [**information barrier**](https://zoom.us/account/information_barriers) page.\n\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* To enable information barriers for yout account, [contact Zoom Support](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362003).\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barriers:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `information_barrier:update:policy:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `information_barriers.policy_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who updated the policy."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "assigned_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assigner group's (Group 1) ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "policy_name": {
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "settings": {
                            "additionalProperties": false,
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's settings. \n* If the meeting setting is true, then a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups. \n* If the meeting setting is false but the screen_share, file_transfer, in_meeting_chat, im, and/or recording settings are true, then a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists between both groups.",
                            "properties": {
                              "complete_phone_calls": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** call each other.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "file_transfer": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** transfer files in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "im": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** IM chat. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "in_meeting_chat": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** use chat in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "meeting": {
                                "description": "If true, the users between groups **cannot** meet. This also creates a [hard block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "message_via_sms": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** user SMS.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "recording": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** record the meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false. \n\nThis feature is only available for Zoom Client v5.6.0 and higher.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "screen_share": {
                                "description": "If true, users between groups **cannot** share screens in a meeting. This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              }
                            },
                            "required": [
                              "meeting",
                              "screen_share",
                              "file_transfer",
                              "in_meeting_chat",
                              "complete_phone_calls",
                              "message_via_sms",
                              "im",
                              "recording"
                            ],
                            "type": "object"
                          },
                          "status": {
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's status: \n* 0 \u2014 Disabled. \n* 1 \u2014 Enabled.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          },
                          "to_group_id": {
                            "description": "The assignee group's (Group 2) ID.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "mjLMOSAERBaakF8kSDWB7g"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "default": 0,
                            "description": "The Information Barriers policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                            "enum": [
                              0,
                              1,
                              2,
                              3
                            ],
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 1
                          }
                        },
                        "description": "The diff of the [Information Barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policy and its information.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "assigned_group_id",
                          "to_group_id",
                          "policy_name",
                          "settings",
                          "type",
                          "status"
                        ],
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"information_barriers.policy_updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1660013569332,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"Mt6sv4u0TAyPkwgsL2lxiA\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n            \"id\": \"0r1HpfZYQB6gWNSdlGYS9A\",\n\t\t\t\"new_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t},\n            \"old_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": true,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {

                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {

                      "properties": {

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
                                  "type": "boolean"

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false. \n\nThis feature is only available for Zoom Client v5.6.0 and higher.",

This also creates a [soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) between both groups if the meeting value is false.",
