                            "type": {
                              "default": 0,
                              "description": "The Information Barriers policy's type of settings restrictions: \n* 0 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists, but users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n* 1 \u2014 A [hard or soft block](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers#h_a603c6f7-05c8-4de5-b4b6-91982d748b34) exists and only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 2 \u2014 No blocks exist, but only users in Group 1 can chat with users in Group 2. \n* 3 \u2014 No blocks exist and users in Group 1 and Group 2 can chat with each other. \n\nThis field only supports 0.",
                              "enum": [
                                0,
                                1,
                                2,
                                3
                              ],
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 1
                            }
                          },
                          "description": "The diff of the [Information Barrier](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360040913711-Information-Barriers) policy and its information.",
                          "required": [
                            "id",
                            "assigned_group_id",
                            "to_group_id",
                            "policy_name",
                            "settings",
                            "type",
                            "status"
                          ],
                          "additionalProperties": false
                        }
                      },
                      "additionalProperties": false
                    }
                  },
                  "additionalProperties": false
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"information_barriers.policy_updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1660013569332,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"Mt6sv4u0TAyPkwgsL2lxiA\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n            \"id\": \"0r1HpfZYQB6gWNSdlGYS9A\",\n\t\t\t\"new_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t},\n            \"old_policy\": {\n\t\t\t  \"assigned_group_id\": \"O5FnCpUOSeSzfoBcosSc3A\",\n\t\t\t  \"to_group_id\": \"NCLsKWGUQ0KEdrg3DBQKLQ\",\n\t\t\t  \"policy_name\": \"tes1_test2\",\n\t\t\t  \"settings\": {\n\t\t\t  \t\"meeting\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"screen_share\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"file_transfer\": true,\n\t\t\t  \t\"in_meeting_chat\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"im\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"recording\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"complete_phone_calls\": false,\n\t\t\t  \t\"message_via_sms\": true\n\t\t\t  },\n\t\t\t  \"type\": 0,\n\t\t\t  \"status\": 1\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "account.vanity_url_approved": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.vanity_url_approved",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.vanity_url_approved\n\nThe **Account's vanity url approved** event is triggered each time an account or sub account's [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646) is approved.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing) with the **Master account** option enabled.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **Account's vanity url approved** subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:vanity_url:master`,`account:read:vanity_url:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.vanity_url_approved`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who approved the account's vanity URL."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the account's approved vanity URL.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "vanity_url"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The account's ID."
                          },
                          "vanity_url": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The approved [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646-Guidelines-for-Vanity-URL-requests)."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.vanity_url_approved\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"vanity_url\": \"https://example.com\",\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "operator",
                        "object"
                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "format": "email",
                          "description": "The email address of the user who approved the account's vanity URL."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the account's approved vanity URL.",
                          "required": [
                            "id",
                            "vanity_url"
                          ],
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The account's ID."
                            },
                            "vanity_url": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The approved [vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646-Guidelines-for-Vanity-URL-requests)."
                            }
                          },
                          "additionalProperties": false
                        }
                      },
                      "additionalProperties": false
                    }
                  },
                  "additionalProperties": false
                },
                "examples": {
                  "json-example": {
                    "summary": "JSON example",
                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"account.vanity_url_approved\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"vanity_url\": \"https://example.com\",\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "account.settings_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "account"
        ],
        "operationId": "account.settings_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# account.settings_updated\n\nZoom triggers this event when an account or a sub account's [settings](https://zoom.us/account/setting) are updated.\nThe account must belong either to you or a user of your [webhook-enabled](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/webhook-reference#enable-webhooks) app.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The \"**Account/Sub Account's setting has been updated**\" subscription enabled under the **Account** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:master`,`account:read:admin`,`account:write:admin`,`account:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `account:read:account_setting:master`,`account:read:account_setting:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `account.settings_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account's owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who updated the account's settings."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who updated the account's settings."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the updated fields.",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The updated account's ID."
                          },
                          "settings": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the account's updated settings.",
                            "properties": {
                              "schedule_meeting": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "Information about the schedule meeting settings.",
                                "properties": {
                                  "host_video": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to start meetings with the host video on."
                                  },
                                  "participant_video": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to start meetings with the participant video on."
                                  },
                                  "audio_type": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The type of audio used to join the meeting."
                                  },
                                  "join_before_host": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether participants can join the meeting before its host."
                                  },
                                  "enforce_login": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether only users who are signed in to Zoom can join meetings."
                                  },
                                  "enforce_login_with_domains": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether only users with a specific domain can join meetings."
                                  },
                                  "enforce_login_domains": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The specified domains for users to sign in to in order to join meetings."
                                  },
                                  "not_store_meeting_topic": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to display the \"Zoom Meeting\" message as the meeting's topic."
                                  },
                                  "force_pmi_jbh_password": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to require a password for personal meetings if attendees can join before host."
                                  },
                                  "use_pmi_for_scheduled_meetings": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Use a [PMI (Personal Meeting ID)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203276937-Using-Personal-Meeting-ID-PMI-) to schedule meeting."
                                  },
                                  "pstn_password_protected": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Require a password from participants before joining a meeting via [PSTN](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204517069-Getting-Started-with-Personal-Audio-Conference)."
                                  },
                                  "jbh_time": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      0,
                                      5,
                                      10,
                                      15
                                    ],
                                    "description": "If the value of the join_before_host field is true, this field indicates the time limits within which a participant can join a meeting before the meeting's host:\n\n* 0 \u2014 Allow the participant to join the meeting at anytime.\n* 5 \u2014 Allow the participant to join 5 minutes before the meeting's start time.\n* 10 \u2014 Allow the participant to join 10 minutes before the meeting's start time."
                                  },
                                  "personal_meeting": {
                                    "description": "The personal meeting settings:\n* true \u2014 Indicates that the **Enable Personal Meeting ID** setting is enabled. Users can use a personal meeting ID for their meetings.\n* false \u2014 Indicates that the **Enable Personal Meeting ID** setting is [disabled](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362843-Personal-meeting-ID-PMI-and-personal-link#h_aa0335c8-3b06-41bc-bc1f-a8b84ef17f2a). When this setting is **disabled**, meetings that were scheduled with a PMI will be invalid. You must manually update any scheduled meetings.\n\n**For Zoom Phone only:**\n\nIf a user has been assigned a desk phone, the desk phone's **Elevate to Zoom Meeting** setting will be disabled.",
                                    "type": "boolean"
                                  },
                                  "require_password_for_instant_meetings": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether a random password will be generated on the end of user who starts the instant meeting. Other meeting participants **must** enter the generated password to join the meeting.\n\nIf instant meetings use a PMI, this option is **disabled**."
                                  },
                                  "mute_upon_entry": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to automatically mute all participants when they join the meeting."
                                  },
                                  "require_password_for_pmi_meetings": {
                                    "description": "Require participants to enter password for PMI meetings:\n* jbh_only \u2014 Only when a participant joins before the host.\n* all \u2014 All participants must enter a password to join the meeting.\n* none \u2014 No password required.",
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "enum": [
                                      "jbh_only",
                                      "all",
                                      "none"
                                    ]
                                  },
                                  "use_pmi_for_instant_meetings": {
                                    "description": "Whether PMI is enabled for all instant meetings.",
                                    "type": "boolean"
                                  },
                                  "require_password_for_scheduling_new_meetings": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether a password is generated when a meeting host schedules a new meeting. Meeting participants will be required to enter the password before they can join the meeting.\n\nThis setting only applies to regular meetings that do **not** use a PMI."
                                  },
                                  "pmi_password": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The PMI's password."
                                  },
                                  "upcoming_meeting_reminder": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to receive a desktop notification for upcoming meetings."
                                  },
                                  "always_display_zoom_meeting_as_topic": {
                                    "description": "Information about the [**Always display \"Zoom Meeting\" as the meeting topic**](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363253-Changing-account-settings#h_01EG9BJ646V2WJK1S3H2MP6YV6) setting.",
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Always display \"Zoom Meeting\" as the meeting topic** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "display_topic_for_scheduled_meetings": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to display \"Zoom Meeting\" as the topic for already-scheduled meetings."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "hide_meeting_description": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the **Hide meeting description** feature.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Hide meeting description** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "hide_description_for_scheduled_meetings": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to hide the description for already-scheduled meetings."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "always_display_zoom_webinar_as_topic": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the [**Always show \"Zoom Webinar\" as the webinar topic**](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363253-Changing-account-settings#h_01EG9BJ646V2WJK1S3H2MP6YV6) setting.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Always show \"Zoom Webinar\" as the webinar topic** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "display_topic_for_scheduled_webinars": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to display \"Zoom Webinar\" as the topic for already-scheduled meetings."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "hide_webinar_description": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the **Hide webinar description** feature.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the **Hide webinar description** setting is enabled."
                                      },
                                      "hide_description_for_scheduled_webinars": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether to hide webinar description for the webinars which have already been scheduled."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "in_meeting": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "Information about the in meeting settings.",
                                "properties": {
                                  "e2e_encryption": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to require [AES encryption](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard) for meetings."
                                  },
                                  "chat": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether meeting participants can use [in-meeting chat](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203650445-In-Meeting-Chat)."
                                  },
                                  "allow_users_to_delete_messages_in_meeting_chat": {
                                    "description": "If the value of this field is set to true,  allow users to delete messages in the in-meeting chat.\n",
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "example": true
                                  },
                                  "allow_participants_chat_with": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      1,
                                      2,
                                      3,
                                      4
                                    ],
                                    "x-enum-descriptions": [
                                      "No one",
                                      "Host and co-hosts",
                                      "Everyone",
                                      "Everyone and anyone directly"
                                    ],
                                    "description": "Whether participants can chat with certain groups:\n* 1 \u2014 The participants cannot use chat.\n* 2 \u2014 Host and co-hosts only.\n * 3 \u2014 The participants can chat with other participants publicly.\n* 4 - The participants can chat with other participants publicly and privately.\n\n**Note:** This setting is only available with client versions 5.7.3 and above."
                                  },
                                  "allow_users_save_chats": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      1,
                                      2,
                                      3
                                    ],
                                    "x-enum-descriptions": [
                                      "Not allowed",
                                      "Host and co-hosts",
                                      "Everyone"
                                    ],
                                    "description": "Whether participants can save meeting chats:\n* 1 \u2014 Participants cannot save meeting chats.\n* 2 \u2014 Participants can only save host and co-host meeting chats.\n* 3 \u2014 Participants can save all meeting chats."
                                  },
                                  "private_chat": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether meeting participants can use private chat."
                                  },
                                  "auto_saving_chat": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to automatically save all in-meeting chats."
                                  },
                                  "file_transfer": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether file sharing via in-meeting chat is enabled."
                                  },
                                  "feedback": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether users can send feedback to Zoom at the end of the meeting."
                                  },
                                  "post_meeting_feedback": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to display a post-meeting feedback survey at the end of a meeting."
                                  },
                                  "co_host": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to allow the meeting host to add co-hosts."
                                  },
                                  "polling": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether polls are available in the meeting controls."
                                  },
                                  "meeting_polling": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "description": "Information about the account's meeting polling settings.",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the host can add polls before or during a meeting."
                                      },
                                      "advanced_polls": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the host can create advanced polls and quizzes. Advanced polls and quizzes include single choice, multiple choice, drop down, matching, short answer, long answer, rank order, and fill-in-the-blank questions. Hosts can also set the correct answers for quizzes they create."
                                      },
                                      "require_answers_to_be_anonymous": {
                                        "description": "Whether to require answers to be anonymous.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "allow_alternative_host_to_add_edit": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether alternative hosts can add or edit polls and quizzes."
                                      },
                                      "manage_saved_polls_and_quizzes": {
                                        "description": "Whether to allow users to manage saved polls and quizzes from Meetings",
                                        "type": "boolean"
                                      },
                                      "allow_host_to_upload_image": {
                                        "description": "Whether to allow host to upload an image for each question.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      }
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "attendee_on_hold": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether hosts can temporarily place an attendee on hold."
                                  },
                                  "show_meeting_control_toolbar": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to always display the meeting control bar."
                                  },
                                  "allow_show_zoom_windows": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to display the Zoom desktop application when sharing access."
                                  },
                                  "annotation": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether participants can use annotation tools to add information to shared screens."
                                  },
                                  "whiteboard": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether participants can share a whiteboard that includes annotation tools."
                                  },
                                  "webinar_question_answer": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether Q&A is enabled in a webinar."
                                  },
                                  "meeting_question_answer": {
                                    "description": "Allow participants to ask questions for the host and participants to answer.",
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "example": true
                                  },
                                  "anonymous_question_answer": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether anonymous Q&A is enabled in a webinar."
                                  },
                                  "breakout_room": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether the host can split meeting participants into separate, smaller rooms."
                                  },
                                  "breakout_room_schedule": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether the host can assign participants to breakout rooms when scheduling. This feature is **only** available in version 4.5.0 or higher."
                                  },
                                  "closed_caption": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether the host can add closed captions."
                                  },
                                  "far_end_camera_control": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether another user can take control of camera during a meeting."
